an4.178:1.6: Tassa kho evaṃ → tassa kho etaṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed); evaṃ kho tassa (?)
an4.178:1.7: lepagatena → lasagatena (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); lapagatena (sya-all) | gaṇheyyapi → gaṇheyyāpi (pts-vp-pli1ed); gayheyyapi (?) | bajjheyyapi → khajjeyyapi (bj); bajjheyyāpi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
an4.178:1.11: Tassa kho evaṃ → tassa kho etaṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed); evaṃ kho tassa (?)
